name: @community/lambda-matching
description: Match generation Lambda function for Community App

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../function.zip .
scripts.bundle: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build && npm run zip-with-deps
scripts.zip-with-deps: cd .. && zip -r matching/function.zip matching/dist matching/node_modules shared/dist -x '*.ts' -x '*.map'
